reviewtext: I believe the camera takes 30 shots.  We got "money shots" of the boys feeding NURSE SHARKS.  Follow the directions, and you can have good quality photos.  No pictures below 5 feet of water.  No full sun pictures.  There is no stress in giving a 5 year-old a $10.00 camera.  It is a little hard to wind the film knob.
summary: USE THIS CHEAP CAMERA ON THE BEACH & IN WATER
